Zend_Gdata_AuthSub

Zend_Gdata  
http://code.google.com/apis/accounts/AuthForWebApps.html  
Gdata  
No 
No 

Description

Wrapper around Zend_Http_Client to facilitate Google's "Account Authentication Proxy for Web-Based Applications".

Methods

AuthSubRevokeToken, getAuthSubSessionToken, getAuthSubTokenInfo, getAuthSubTokenUri, getHttpClient,

AuthSubRevokeToken( string   $token, Zend_Http_Client   $client = null, string   $request_uri = self, ) : boolean

Description

Revoke a token

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$token string | The token to revoke
$client Zend_Http_Client | (optional) HTTP client to use to make the request null
$request_uri string | (optional) URI to which to direct the revokation request self

Return value

Type Description
boolean Whether the revokation was successful

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_HttpException

getAuthSubSessionToken( string   $token, Zend_Http_Client   $client = null, string   $request_uri = self, ) : string

Description

Upgrades a single use token to a session token

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$token string | The single use token which is to be upgraded
$client Zend_Http_Client | (optional) HTTP client to use to make the request null
$request_uri string | (optional) URI to which to direct the session token upgrade self

Return value

Type Description
string The upgraded token value

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_AuthException
throws Zend_Gdata_App_HttpException

getAuthSubTokenInfo( string   $token, Zend_Http_Client   $client = null, string   $request_uri = self, ) : n/a

Description

get token information

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$token string | The token to retrieve information about
$client Zend_Http_Client | (optional) HTTP client to use to make the request null
$request_uri string | (optional) URI to which to direct the information request self

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getAuthSubTokenUri( string   $next, string   $scope, int   $secure = 0, int   $session = 0, string   $request_uri = self, ) : n/a

Description

Creates a URI to request a single-use AuthSub token.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$next string | (required) URL identifying the service to be accessed. The resulting token will enable access to the specified service only. Some services may limit scope further, such as read-only access.
$scope string | (required) URL identifying the service to be accessed. The resulting token will enable access to the specified service only. Some services may limit scope further, such as read-only access.
$secure int | (optional) Boolean flag indicating whether the authentication transaction should issue a secure token (1) or a non-secure token (0). Secure tokens are available to registered applications only. 0
$session int | (optional) Boolean flag indicating whether the one-time-use token may be exchanged for a session token (1) or not (0). 0
$request_uri string | (optional) URI to which to direct the authentication request. self

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getHttpClient( string   $token, Zend_Gdata_HttpClient   $client = null, ) : n/a

Description

Retrieve a HTTP client object with AuthSub credentials attached as the Authorization header

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$token string | The token to retrieve information about
$client Zend_Gdata_HttpClient | (optional) HTTP client to use to make the request null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
